archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.12b: b) file-based encryption software to safeguard individual files and folders (including files on removable media and flash memory cards, such as secure digital (SD))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
